|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:17:3F, 00:1C:DF |oui = 00:17:3F, 00:1C:DF |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 2 |pwr_barrel_inner = 4.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 6.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = belkin54g |defaultssid_regex = ^belkin54g$ |default_ch = |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/08/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM SerComm (YGH00E-1.0) The device appears to share the same board ID with the [[Belkin F5D7231-4 v3]] / [[Dynex DX-WEGRTR]]. On the DD-WRT [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Known_incompatible_devices known incompatible devices list].
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=167500&sid=d0885f37533998dd886f0ba84c5c1b3d Images on the DD-WRT forum]
[http://www.seattlewireless.net/Belkin_F5D7230-4 F5D7230-4 series on SeattleWireless] The power adapter that came with the device is a '''DVE''' DSA-5W-05 AUS 050100 (5V, 1A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Pictures==
